meanings.definition: To show or prove that something is true or real
meanings.sent1: His signature on the document attests to its authenticity.
meanings.sent2: The fingerprints found at the scene attests to the presence of the suspect.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot attests to the fact that pets can mimic human speech.
meanings.sent4: The blooming flowers attests to the arrival of spring in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The loud applause from the audience attests to the success of the performance.

meanings.definition: To declare that something is true or genuine
meanings.sent1: The witness will attests to the accuracy of the statement.
meanings.sent2: The notary public attests to the validity of the signature on the document.
meanings.sent3: The barking dog attests to the presence of a stranger near the house.
meanings.sent4: The shining diamond attests to the purity of the gemstone.
meanings.sent5: The bright smile on her face attests to her happiness and contentment.
